page.title: 08Upottery's Amenities 2
page.content: The{football club}use a field which belongs to one of the farms. The only{Church}in our area is also situated in Upottery. There are few other facilities in the village.Only the recently built Oak Tree Close has street lights. Upottery does not even have a{post {office}any longer but there is one in nearby{Rawridge.} There is a{garage}where you can also obtain petrol on the {A.303 road.} The only public transport is a bus which takes people to market in Taunton once a week. A relatively recent development has been the{Post Bus}service.On certain journeys in the Upottery and Honiton area the Post Office uses a mini-bus instead of a van and this carries passengers on each journey.This is useful as people heve to shop in town.
